articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Blue Jays' Bass sorry for anti-LGBTQ post as Kershaw backs Christian Faith Day - The Guardian
articles.description: Toronto Blue Jays pitcher Anthony Bass apologized on Tuesday for expressing support on social media for anti-LGBTQ+ boycotts of Target and Bud Light
articles.content:
Toronto Blue Jays pitcher Anthony Bass apologized on Tuesday for expressing support on social media for anti-LGBTQ+ boycotts of Target and Bud Light.
Bass shared a post on his Instagram stories on M… [+3843 chars]
